Uses of Class
ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer.feature.Feature

  • Packages that use Feature 
    Package Description
    ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer  
    ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer.feature  

    • Uses of Feature in ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer

      Methods in ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer with parameters of type Feature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Weighter.addFeature(Feature feature) 
      void IWeighter.addFeature(Feature feature)
      Adds feature to feature list

    • Uses of Feature in ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer.feature

      Subclasses of Feature in ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer.feature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AffixPresenceFeature
      Calculates the number of supplied affixes that occur in each sentence.
      class  BasicWordsFeature
      Calculates the number of supplied basic words that occur in each sentence.
      class  ClusterKeywordFeature
      The ClusterKeywordFeature is a method proposed by Luhn.
      class  CuePhraseFeature
      CuePhraseFeature checks for specified indicator phrases in sentences.
      class  GlobalBushyFeature
      The GlobalBushyFeature was proposed by Salton et al - "The bushiness of a node on a map is defined as the number of links connecting it to other nodes on the map.
      class  ImportantTermsFeature
      Calculates the number of supplied technical terms that occur in each sentence.
      class  LuceneFeature
      A LuceneFeature uses Lucene to aid sentence scoring.
      class  NamedEntityFeature
      Calculates the number of named entities that occur in each sentence.
      class  PunctuationFeature
      Calculates what proportion of the sentence contains punctuation.
      class  QueryBiasFeature
      Bias factor to score sentences containing query terms more highly.
      sentence score = (number of query terms)^2/number of terms in query
      class  SectionImportanceFeature
      Sentences within certain sections are scored differently.
      class  ShortSentenceFeature
      Scores sentences with too few terms negatively.
      class  SkimmingFeature
      Applies a linear deboost function to simulate the manual heuristic of summarizing by skimming the first few sentences off a paragraph.
      class  TermCheckingFeature
      Feature checking for the existence of terms within sentences.
      class  TFISFFeature
      Like TFIDF, except we're working at sentence level.
      class  TitleTermFeature
      The title of an article often reveals the major subject of that document.
